Problem Configuration.Name: Likelihood Model
Problem Configuration.Description: Indicates how Korali will evaluate the likelihood component.

Problem Configuration.Name: Reference Data
Problem Configuration.Description: Evaluation of the model on specific data points, required to calculate likelihood.

Variables Configuration.Name: Type
Variables Configuration.Description: Specifies the purpose of the variable for the bayesian model.

Internal Settings.Name: Computational Variable Indices
Internal Settings.Description: Stores the indices of variables that are of computational type.

Internal Settings.Name: Statistical Variable Indices
Internal Settings.Description: Stores the indices of variables that are of statistical type.
